/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, giving a sense of being immersed in the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the sidewalk. Street lamps stand sentinel along the sidewalk, their presence adding a touch of urban charm to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, a body of water can be seen, its calm surface reflecting the sunlight. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of urban and natural elements.
